detail_table_characteristics: Page 4-7 contain detail tables with '담보별 보장내용' header
Column structure: [담보별 보장내용 (merged cols), 가입금액, 보험료(원), 납입기간/보험기간, other]
Pages 2-3 contain summary tables (31 rows, 18 rows respectively)
Summary tables appear before detail tables
structural_risks: Summary table on page 2-3 has different column structure (5-6 cols) than detail tables (7 cols)
Header '피보험자(1/1) : 통합고객' spans multiple columns (merged header)

evidences.snippet:
담보별 보장내용 | 가입금액 | 보험료(원) | 납입기간
